content.title: Intro
content.content:
2000
Preceded by
2000
2001
Year
2002
Followed by
2002

Tolkien-related events that took place in 2001.

content.title: January
content.content:
3 - The Peruvian Tolkien Society is founded.
17 - Richard E. Blackwelder, Tolkien collector, dies.
? - Other Hands 31/32 is published.

content.title: February
content.content: 26 - Philologist Brian Miller, student and friend of J.R.R. Tolkien, dies.

content.title: April
content.content:
5 - Actor Theodore Isidore Gottlieb dies.
28 - Actor Paul Daneman dies.

content.title: May
content.content: 11 - Kinder Surprise begins its Lord of the Rings promotion in Germany.

content.title: June
content.content:
25 - Actress Pauline Letts dies.
27 - Artist Tove Jansson dies.

content.title: July
content.content:
5 - Tolkien Thing III.
? - Vinyar Tengwar 42 is published.
? - Other Hands 33/34 is published.

content.title: October
content.content:
30- The parody book The Roadkill of Middle Earth is published.
31 - Tyalie Tyelellieva issue 17 is published.

content.title: November
content.content:
6 - Decipher publishes the first set of "Decipher Cards", The Fellowship of the Ring.
9 - Translator Tore Zetterholm dies.
10 - The premiere of the first episode of the Slovak radio serial adaptation Pán prsteňov.
19 - Meditations on Middle-earth is published.
20 - The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack is released in public.
27 - Music Inspired by Middle Earth, a musical album featuring many artists, including David Arkenstone, is released.
29 - Quest for the Ring airs on FOX TV.
? - Finding God in The Lord of the Rings is published.

content.title: December
content.content:
4 - The documentary Master of the Rings is released.
10 - The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring premieres in Odeon Leicester Square, London.
15 - Tyalie Tyelellieva issue 18 is published.
15 - Conclusion of the first series (season) of the Slovak radio serial adaptation Pán prsteňov.
19 - The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring is released in cinemas world-wide.
? - Tolkien: Man and Myth is published.
Years
1998 1999 2000 2001 2002 2003 2004
